info.name: Trip Sync API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Trip Sync microservices system. This collection includes all endpoints for authentication, user management, trips, tasks, locations, GPS tracking, notifications, and reporting.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Site Inspection",
  "description": "Inspect construction site and submit report",
  "tripId": "{{trip_id}}",
  "assignedTo": "{{user_id}}",
  "dueDate": "2024-02-02T17:00:00Z",
  "priority": "high",
  "status": "pending",
  "requiredProofs": ["photo", "document"]
}

{
  "name": "Bangkok Office",
  "type": "office",
  "address": "123 Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok 10110",
  "latitude": 13.7563,
  "longitude": 100.5018,
  "radius": 100,
  "description": "Main Bangkok office location",
  "isActive": true
}

query.description: Maximum age of location data in seconds
